entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 48 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
